chapter.title: Project Information
chapter.para: The HornetQ project page is here. You can download any releases from there.
If you have any user questions please use our user forum
If you have development related questions, please use our development forum
Pop in and chat to us in our IRC channel
All our release tags are here

Red Hat kindly employs developers to work full time on HornetQ, the motley crew are:
Tim Fox (project lead)
Howard Gao
Jeff Mesnil
Clebert Suconic
Andy Taylor
